entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI - Youth of Today 1998. Media consumption habits of students in Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D75: TÁRKI - Youth of Today 1998. Media consumption habits of students in Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Tarjányi, József
entry.dcterms:description: the free time habits of youth, their opinion about various social values, the character and quality of their relationships with friends and parents, the effect of the media, with special regard to watching TV
entry.dcterms:subject: social stratification and groupings
law, crime and legal systems
mass media
time use
social behaviour and attitudes
family life, marriage, relationship
education, school
person
survey data
cross-section
A random sample of students aged 10-18 attending the 4th-8th grades of elementary school and secondary school in Budapest, Paks and Szentlőrinc in the 1998-99 school year.
self-administered questionnaire
A
